body.name: Ottomanson 9" Twin Mattress in a Box Made in USA, Firm Mattress, Hybrid Mattress Cool Improved Airflow with Edge to Edge Pocket Coil, Bed in A Box, Ottopedic
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: 1. Individualized Support: Each coil is individually wrapped and operates independently, providing tailored support and pressure relief based on the sleeper's body weight and movements.

2. Enhanced Comfort: The hybrid design combines the adaptive comfort of foam with the responsive support of pocket coils, creating a perfect balance of pressure relief and spinal alignment for all sleeping positions.
3. Motion Isolation: Pocket coils minimize motion transfer, ensuring an undisturbed night's sleep even if your partner moves during the night.

4. Breathability and Temperature Regulation: The edge-to-edge pocket coil system allows for better airflow compared to traditional closed coil systems or dense foam mattresses. This increased ventilation helps dissipate heat and maintain a comfortable temperature throughout the night.
5. Better Edge Support: The edge-to-edge coil structure offers consistent support, preventing sagging or roll-off along the edges.
body.description: Our Ottopedic Mattresses combine high quality materials in traditional stores with online-shopping advantages like convenience and cost-effectiveness. A good night's sleep is key to wake up fresh and relaxed. Durably engineered with comfort in mind, this mattress will provide you the dream sleep and best rest. With just the right amount of support and cushioning, this mattress relieves pain and stress in pressure points, on your head, neck, hips, lower back and spine while eliminating motion transfer thanks to sumptuous layers. And it is perfect for your individual body shape. Quilted with high-quality breathable fabric which is strong, light, and soft, this mattress allows ample airflow and regulates temperature keeping the sleep surface cool and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, firm, Made in USA a bonus
reviews.reviewText: First experience with a roll-up mattress, I was skeptical about whether they would really be a firm mattress. Totally satisfied. Gave it the recommended 3 days to fully unspring and it was a great, firm comfortable mattress to sleep on. Given how much easier it was to shop and get in the bedroom than a store-bought mattress, this is the way I'm going for future purposes, too. Just one caveat: when you're sitting on the side of the bed to step in and step out, it does sag a lot more than a non-compression inner spring. Not sure why that doesn't happen when you're prone, but it doesn't. Nice that it was Made in USA, too, and competitively priced with the imported alternatives. No smell/ outgassing, either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never thought I'd buy a bed in a box but I did. Price was decent. Free shipping. Altho delivery DUMPED where it was hard to reach. Comfortable, firm enuff and cud pay with payments

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfy
reviews.reviewText: A friend recently bought these mattresses for her kids and recommended them to me when I was looking for mattresses for my kids. I bought two and have been pleased with both. My kids say they sleep well (a 14 year old and 10 year old). I wouldn’t hesitate to buy from this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Guest bedroom purchase
reviews.reviewText: Since this was purchased for the guest room, I can only base my comments on how the first guests felt about the bed.I agree with some reviews; that the sides slope and have little support. Sitting on the sides of the bed to dress or put on shoes is when you would notice this the most. Guests thought that the bed over-all, had nice support, and was great to sleep on.As far as reviews that complain the mattress doesn't have a long wear-life; I assume that ours will be fine for some time, due to being a guest use only bed.It inflated very quickly; but didn't reach 12", even after a long resting period. It appears well made, and had no smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one holds up.
reviews.reviewText: Well, after burning through several hybrid mattresses, that would only last 2 months at best before sagging and causing pain and restless nights trying to find a comfortable high spot to fall asleep on. I came across this one. I'm 6 foot and my weight hovers around 240. This mattress IS firm. But that's what I wanted, good thick springs. To help soften it up, I went with a 2-inch latex mattress topper. It's been 7 months now; I do have to turn the topper because it will sag, or some may say conform. The first time that happened, I thought the mattress was starting to sag, but no, the mattress is like the day I got it. No more pain or broken sleep. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The mattress meets expectations. I didn't like that they didn't leave the order at the door
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is hard, as I wanted. It broke right away and I was happy. I didn't like that they didn't leave the order at the door because they needed a signature, so I had to sleep on the floor one night until they brought it again the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for back pain
reviews.reviewText: Purchased King MattressPackaging - Package arrived on time, it was heavy and atleast 2 people are needed to lift it. I have to take it 2 flights up so it was painfulUnpacking - To unpack, usually mattress company provides special blade but this one didn't had one (not an issue since I had it from my previous mattress purchase)Mattress - The mattress is very comfortable, I am a side sleeper and had a lot of pain with my previous mattress but this is the most comfortable mattress and no back pain in the morningCon - the edges are not firm and hence need to be careful while sitting on the edgesOverall the mattress is great and I am satisfied with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Starts out great but doesn't last long - fine if you don't mind replacing it every month.
reviews.reviewText: This mattress started out great. We thought it was the answer to our prayers - firm enough for his bad back and comfy enough for my arthritis. However, it didn't last.We've been sleeping on this mattress for almost exactly five (5) weeks and it's sagging terribly. The sides don't stay firm and it's almost like sleeping on a soft mattress we sink in so far. It's not comfortable and we're not sleeping -- again. Unfortunately, the "return" policy is only if you don't even open the mattress in the first place - it has to be returned in it's original, unopened state. So, now we have a mattress that roughly cost us $100/wk to sleep on. NO thank you!
